+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8336781
+ * @summary Erroneous exhaustivity check with boolean switch
+ * @enablePreview
+ * @compile -XDshould-stop.at=FLOW T8336781.java
+ */
+public class T8336781 {
+    public static void test() {
+        Boolean bool = null;
+        var _ = switch (bool) {
+            case null -> "nothing";
+            case true -> "something true";
+            case false -> "something false";
+        };
+    }
+}
